Text: Jews in Ben Gurion Airport were dismayed to discover Turkish Muslims praying in the airport’s shul.   Arutz Sheva   Jews in Ben Gurion Airport were dismayed to discover Turkish Muslims praying in the airport’s shul, on the eve of the holiday of Simchat Torah.
